title: [Ta'Illistim, Alearyl Hall]
description: The floor is a highly polished dark grey granite and narrow runners make way between a multitude of shelves.  The racks fill the room, each loaded with a heap of valuable treasure.  A host of guards monitor the room's activity, one poised at either end of every single row.  A trio of oil lamps adequately illuminate the room's valuables and rewards.
